# Code of Conduct

::: {.g-col-6 .text_block}
### Code of Conduct

satRdays is dedicated to providing a harassment-free experience for participants at all of our events. We encourage all submitters to review our complete [Code of Conduct](https://events.linuxfoundation.org/r-medicine/attend/code-of-conduct/).
